p: A mixture of the required compound 4 (2 mmol) and either thiosemicarbazide hydrochloride or semicarbazide hydrochloride(2 mmol) in ethanol (20 ml) was stirred at 50–60 °C for 8–12 h in the presence of five drops of concentrated hydrochloric acid. The solution was evaporated to dryness under reduced pressure, and the residue was purified by silica gel column chromatography using dichloromethane:methanol (80:1) as the eluent.
